./external/basejump_stl/bsg_misc/bsg_unconcentrate_static.v Cov: 27.8% 

   1: // takes an input vector and spreads the elements according to a bit pattern
   2: // example width_p=3, pattern_els_p=5'b10101
   3: module bsg_unconcentrate_static #(pattern_els_p="inv"
   4:                                   , width_lp=`BSG_COUNTONES_SYNTH(pattern_els_p)
   5:                                  )
   6: (input [width_lp-1:0] i
   7:  ,output [$bits(pattern_els_p)-1:0] o
   8:  );
   9:    genvar j;
  10: 
  11:    if (pattern_els_p[0])
  12:      assign o[0] = i[0];
  13:    else
  14:      assign o[0] = `BSG_DISCONNECTED_IN_SIM(1'b0);
  15: 
  16:    for (j = 1; j < $bits(pattern_els_p); j=j+1)
  17:      begin: rof
  18:              if (pattern_els_p[j])
  19:                assign o[j] = i[`BSG_COUNTONES_SYNTH(pattern_els_p[j-1:0])];
  20:              else
  21:                assign o[j] = `BSG_DISCONNECTED_IN_SIM(1'b0);
  22:      end
  23: 
  24: endmodule
  25:
